name: T - Lily Noelle
_source: speak;Noelle; Hey, you're one of those mysterious travelers!
speak;Lily; Hm? Mysterious?{w} I don't think so.{w} I'm just trying to help.
speak;Noelle; What's your name?{w} Where do you come from?{w} Why are you here in the first place?
speak;Lily; Good heavens, you're too chatty.{w} Just let me do my thing here.
speak;Noelle; Do you have a little more time to talk?
